verses.verse: And <S%G1161><s%> it came to pass <S%G1096><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> Iconium <S%G2430><s%>, that they <S%G846><s%> went <S%G1525><s%> both <S%G2596><s%> together <S%G846><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the synagogue <S%G4864><s%> of the Jews <S%G2453><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> so <S%G3779><s%> spake <S%G2980><s%>, that <S%G5620><s%> a great <S%G4183><s%> multitude <S%G4128><s%> both <S%G5037><s%> of the Jews <S%G2453><s%> and also <S%G2532><s%> of the Greeks <S%G1672><s%> believed <S%G4100><s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> the unbelieving <S%G544><s%> Jews <S%G2453><s%> stirred up <S%G1892><s%> the Gentiles <S%G1484><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> made <S%G2559><s%> their minds <S%G5590><s%> evil affected <S%G2559><s%> against <S%G2596><s%> the brethren <S%G80><s%>.

Long <S%G2425><s%> time <S%G5550><s%> therefore <S%G3303><s%> <S%G3767><s%> abode they <S%G1304><s%> speaking boldly <S%G3955><s%> in <S%G1909><s%> the Lord <S%G2962><s%>, which <S%G3588><s%> gave testimony <S%G3140><s%> unto the word <S%G3056><s%> of his <S%G846><s%> grace <S%G5485><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> granted <S%G1325><s%> signs <S%G4592><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> wonders <S%G5059><s%> to be done <S%G1096><s%> by <S%G1223><s%> their <S%G846><s%> hands <S%G5495><s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> the multitude <S%G4128><s%> of the city <S%G4172><s%> was divided <S%G4977><s%>: and <S%G2532><s%> part <S%G3303><s%> held <S%G2258><s%> with <S%G4862><s%> the Jews <S%G2453><s%>, and <S%G1161><s%> part with <S%G4862><s%> the apostles <S%G652><s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> when <S%G5613><s%> there was <S%G1096><s%> an assault <S%G3730><s%> made <S%G1096><s%> both <S%G5037><s%> of the Gentiles <S%G1484><s%>, and also <S%G2532><s%> of the Jews <S%G2453><s%> with <S%G4862><s%> their <S%G846><s%> rulers <S%G758><s%>, to use them despitefully <S%G5195><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> to stone <S%G3036><s%> them <S%G846><s%>,

They were ware <S%G4894><s%> of it, and fled <S%G2703><s%> unto <S%G1519><s%> Lystra <S%G3082><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> Derbe <S%G1191><s%>, cities <S%G4172><s%> of Lycaonia <S%G3071><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> unto the region that lieth round about <S%G4066><s%>:
And there <S%G2546><s%> they preached the gospel <S%G2258><s%> <S%G2097><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> there sat <S%G2521><s%> a certain <S%G5100><s%> man <S%G435><s%> at <S%G1722><s%> Lystra <S%G3082><s%>, impotent <S%G102><s%> in his feet <S%G4228><s%>, being <S%G5225><s%> a cripple <S%G5560><s%> from <S%G1537><s%> his <S%G846><s%> mother's <S%G3384><s%> womb <S%G2836><s%>, who <S%G3739><s%> never <S%G3763><s%> had walked <S%G4043><s%>:

The same <S%G3778><s%> heard <S%G191><s%> Paul <S%G3972><s%> speak <S%G2980><s%>: who <S%G3739><s%> stedfastly beholding <S%G816><s%> him <S%G846><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> perceiving <S%G1492><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> he had <S%G2192><s%> faith <S%G4102><s%> to be healed <S%G4982><s%>,

Said <S%G2036><s%> with a loud <S%G3173><s%> voice <S%G5456><s%>, Stand <S%G450><s%> upright <S%G3717><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> thy <S%G4675><s%> feet <S%G4228><s%>. And <S%G2532><s%> he leaped <S%G242><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> walked <S%G4043><s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> when the people <S%G3793><s%> saw <S%G1492><s%> what <S%G3739><s%> Paul <S%G3972><s%> had done <S%G4160><s%>, they lifted up <S%G1869><s%> their <S%G846><s%> voices <S%G5456><s%>, saying <S%G3004><s%> in the speech of Lycaonia <S%G3072><s%>, The gods <S%G2316><s%> are come down <S%G2597><s%> to <S%G4314><s%> us <S%G2248><s%> in the likeness <S%G3666><s%> of men <S%G444><s%>.

And <S%G5037><s%> they called <S%G2564><s%> Barnabas <S%G921><s%>, <S%G3303><s%> Jupiter <S%G2203><s%>; and <S%G1161><s%> Paul <S%G3972><s%>, Mercurius <S%G2060><s%>, because <S%G1894><s%> he <S%G846><s%> was <S%G2258><s%> the chief <S%G2233><s%> speaker <S%G3056><s%>.

Then <S%G1161><s%> the priest <S%G2409><s%> of Jupiter <S%G2203><s%>, which <S%G3588><s%> was <S%G5607><s%> before <S%G4253><s%> their <S%G846><s%> city <S%G4172><s%>, brought <S%G5342><s%> oxen <S%G5022><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> garlands <S%G4725><s%> unto <S%G1909><s%> the gates <S%G4440><s%>, and would <S%G2309><s%> have done sacrifice <S%G2380><s%> with <S%G4862><s%> the people <S%G3793><s%>.

Which when <S%G1161><s%> the apostles <S%G652><s%>, Barnabas <S%G921><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> Paul <S%G3972><s%>, heard <S%G191><s%> of, they rent <S%G1284><s%> their <S%G846><s%> clothes <S%G2440><s%>, and ran <S%G1530><s%> in among <S%G1519><s%> the people <S%G3793><s%>, crying out <S%G2896><s%>,

And <S%G2532><s%> saying <S%G3004><s%>, Sirs <S%G435><s%>, why <S%G5101><s%> do ye <S%G4160><s%> these things <S%G5130><s%>? We <S%G2249><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> are <S%G2070><s%> men <S%G444><s%> of like passions <S%G3663><s%> with you <S%G5213><s%>, and preach <S%G2097><s%> unto you <S%G5209><s%> that ye should turn <S%G1994><s%> from <S%G575><s%> these <S%G5023><s%> vanities <S%G3152><s%> unto <S%G1909><s%> the living <S%G2198><s%> God <S%G2316><s%>, which <S%G3739><s%> made <S%G4160><s%> heaven <S%G3772><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> earth <S%G1093><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> the sea <S%G2281><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> all things <S%G3956><s%> that are therein <S%G1722><s%> <S%G846><s%>:

Who <S%G3739><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> times <S%G1074><s%> past <S%G3944><s%> suffered <S%G1439><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> nations <S%G1484><s%> to walk <S%G4198><s%> in their own <S%G846><s%> ways <S%G3598><s%>.

Nevertheless <S%G2544><s%> <S%G2532><s%> he left <S%G863><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> himself <S%G1438><s%> without witness <S%G267><s%>, in that he did good <S%G15><s%>, and gave <S%G1325><s%> us <S%G2254><s%> rain <S%G5205><s%> from heaven <S%G3771><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> fruitful <S%G2593><s%> seasons <S%G2540><s%>, filling <S%G1705><s%> our <S%G2257><s%> hearts <S%G2588><s%> with food <S%G5160><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> gladness <S%G2167><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> with these <S%G5023><s%> sayings <S%G3004><s%> scarce <S%G3433><s%> restrained they <S%G2664><s%> the people <S%G3793><s%>, that they had <S%G2380><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> done sacrifice <S%G2380><s%> unto them <S%G846><s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> there came thither <S%G1904><s%> certain Jews <S%G2453><s%> from <S%G575><s%> Antioch <S%G490><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> Iconium <S%G2430><s%>, who <S%G2532><s%> persuaded <S%G3982><s%> the people <S%G3793><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%>, having stoned <S%G3034><s%> Paul <S%G3972><s%>, drew <S%G4951><s%> him out of <S%G1854><s%> the city <S%G4172><s%>, supposing <S%G3543><s%> he <S%G846><s%> had been dead <S%G2348><s%>.

Howbeit <S%G1161><s%>, as the disciples <S%G3101><s%> stood round about <S%G2944><s%> him <S%G846><s%>, he rose up <S%G450><s%>, and came <S%G1525><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the city <S%G4172><s%>: and <S%G2532><s%> the next day <S%G1887><s%> he departed <S%G1831><s%> with <S%G4862><s%> Barnabas <S%G921><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> Derbe <S%G1191><s%>.

And <S%G5037><s%> when they had preached the gospel <S%G2097><s%> to that <S%G1565><s%> city <S%G4172><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> had taught <S%G3100><s%> many <S%G2425><s%>, they returned again <S%G5290><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> Lystra <S%G3082><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> to Iconium <S%G2430><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> Antioch <S%G490><s%>, had taught many: Gr. had made many disciples

Confirming <S%G1991><s%> the souls <S%G5590><s%> of the disciples <S%G3101><s%>, and exhorting them <S%G3870><s%> to continue <S%G1696><s%> in the faith <S%G4102><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> we <S%G2248><s%> must <S%G1163><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> much <S%G4183><s%> tribulation <S%G2347><s%> enter <S%G1525><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the kingdom <S%G932><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> when they had ordained <S%G5500><s%> them <S%G846><s%> elders <S%G4245><s%> in every <S%G2596><s%> church <S%G1577><s%>, and had prayed <S%G4336><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> fasting <S%G3521><s%>, they commended <S%G3908><s%> them <S%G846><s%> to the Lord <S%G2962><s%>, on <S%G1519><s%> whom <S%G3739><s%> they believed <S%G4100><s%>.
And <S%G2532><s%> after they had passed throughout <S%G1330><s%> Pisidia <S%G4099><s%>, they came <S%G2064><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> Pamphylia <S%G3828><s%>.
And <S%G2532><s%> when they had preached <S%G2980><s%> the word <S%G3056><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> Perga <S%G4011><s%>, they went down <S%G2597><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> Attalia <S%G825><s%>:

And thence <S%G2547><s%> sailed <S%G636><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> Antioch <S%G490><s%>, from whence <S%G3606><s%> they had been <S%G2258><s%> recommended <S%G3860><s%> to the grace <S%G5485><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> for <S%G1519><s%> the work <S%G2041><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> they fulfilled <S%G4137><s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> when they were come <S%G3854><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> had gathered <S%G4863><s%> the church <S%G1577><s%> together <S%G4863><s%>, they rehearsed <S%G312><s%> all <S%G3745><s%> that God <S%G2316><s%> had done <S%G4160><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> them <S%G846><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> how <S%G3754><s%> he had opened <S%G455><s%> the door <S%G2374><s%> of faith <S%G4102><s%> unto the Gentiles <S%G1484><s%>.
And <S%G1161><s%> there <S%G1563><s%> they abode <S%G1304><s%> long <S%G3756><s%> <S%G3641><s%> time <S%G5550><s%> with <S%G4862><s%> the disciples <S%G3101><s%>.
